errors.error_description: The installation command includes a non-existent extra `[jwt]`, which will cause pip to fail. The JWT dependencies are included by default.
correction_candidates: pip install strawberry-django-auth
pip install strawberry-django-auth[pyjwt]
pip install strawberry-django-auth` and `pip install pyjwt
pip install strawberry-django-auth jwt

errors.error_description: The setup instructions incorrectly advise running `manage.py migrate` before adding `strawberry_django_auth` to `INSTALLED_APPS`, which will prevent its migrations from being detected and run.
correction_candidates: Swap the order of steps 2 and 3. First add the app to `INSTALLED_APPS`, then run `migrate`.
Combine steps 2 and 3 into one step.
Run `python manage.py migrate strawberry_django_auth` before adding the app to `INSTALLED_APPS`.
Run `python manage.py makemigrations` and then `migrate` before adding the app to `INSTALLED_APPS`.
errors.golden_answer: Swap the order of steps 2 and 3. First add the app to `INSTALLED_APPS`, then run `migrate`.

errors.error_description: The command to run the development server is incorrect. `django-admin runserver` is not the standard command used within a Django project context.
correction_candidates: python manage.py runserver
./manage.py runserver
django runserver
python -m django runserver

errors.error_description: The installation instructions unnecessarily ask to install `py-jwt` separately. `PyJWT` is a core dependency of `strawberry-django-auth` and is installed automatically. Furthermore, `py-jwt` is an incorrect package name.
correction_candidates: Remove the `pip install py-jwt` command.
Change `pip install py-jwt` to `pip install PyJWT`.
Combine the commands into `pip install strawberry-django-auth PyJWT`.
Change the installation command to `pip install strawberry-django-auth[jwt]`.

errors.error_description: The link to the `CONTRIBUTING.md` file points to an incorrect path within the repository, resulting in a 404 error.
correction_candidates: Change the link to `CONTRIBUTING.md` to point to the root of the repository: `.../blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md`
Change the link to `CONTRIBUTING.md` to be a relative path: `CONTRIBUTING.md`
Change the link to `CONTRIBUTING.md` to point to `.../blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md`
Move the `CONTRIBUTING.md` file into the `/docs` directory.
errors.golden_answer: Change the link to `CONTRIBUTING.md` to point to the root of the repository: `.../blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md`
